description:
Do you read the Bible? Bible Hope gives you hope inspiring bible verse to read. You can simply ask for a a bible verse using a few simple commands:
Give me a bible verse
tell me a verse
give me a verse
etc.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Bible Hope to give me a bible verse
name: Bible Hope
shortDescription: Do you read the Bible? Bible Hope gives you hope inspiring bible verse to read.
